function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SAR-CoV-2 in a smart city due to transmission dynamics and multiple dimensions of the disease","Impact":"High risk of widespread infection and increased mortality if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Implement strict contact tracing, vaccination, personal and government quarantines, and treatment measures","Technologies":"Machine learning for predictive modeling, IoT for contact tracing, vaccine tracking systems, and telemedicine for treatment","People":"Residents of the smart city, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, government, city administration"},{"Description":"Possibility of re-infection and loss of immunity over time","Impact":"Increased risk of continuous outbreaks and difficulty in achieving herd immunity","Mitigation":"Continuous surveillance, monitoring, and adjustment of vaccination strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics for immunity tracking, vaccine development technologies","People":"Residents of the smart city, public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions, vaccine manufacturers"},{"Description":"Undetected infected persons contributing to disease spread","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the spread and identifying hotspots of infection","Mitigation":"Enhance testing capacity, increase public awareness, and improve surveillance systems","Technologies":"Rapid testing technologies, data analytics for hotspot detection, public health communication tools","People":"Residents of the smart city, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities, city administration"}]}
